display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ReVTBzj_NHoQ7kNvwGfny0o&_nc_oc=AdlujFlz7y1jnyEAqD1oB5hpcYPU38kcRGSu_YPNeWMmlDWw0SD2b7fp4qTSuft4O5AYVNnHfnzzvdacGPksUbBe&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=la3FmgpW5ywBSl0xQxSOkA&oh=00_AfFsMVhw5HrrcozGmw7166hsIwBPV2Avrca22m51V-6x5g&oe=6809611D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=p8uXidqRPfgQ7kNvwHeyvBT&_nc_oc=Adn20t1PRVzoz51A754QHESl6-OEZSSC-ziFl09c5BUlwxRWDpDYm5A4rq5c_BbXxng76-FPBa09qGEAE4Cpmsdq&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=la3FmgpW5ywBSl0xQxSOkA&oh=00_AfE69FygO929cWrD7dWLkr22SZzLPtvFfYfylPICjJLNyg&oe=68097B12)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=GyfJZOMFrCAQ7kNvwEkK9W0&_nc_oc=AdnHNYgU-hKOspzf-I7RMuw1fKisPyzNzEC4TS0TfvXUEADuWS37CZ18P_WG7Q7GFUJY77zUdxJo0dSNC4CWK-Be&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=la3FmgpW5ywBSl0xQxSOkA&oh=00_AfHMpFVijSITBKGl8aBQJg4o8yUfNBQ5ef0qq2xh15MbmA&oe=68098123)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=o0MXJ66EZ54Q7kNvwG8L69A&_nc_oc=AdkTU_SdS4Kaj8LTK6WTG-1DjHxfbrJHWeydhjtkd1EDTxd4-zEBibYEGiRIUfe0TlzrpyJCuc6BAGwj-78X601f&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=la3FmgpW5ywBSl0xQxSOkA&oh=00_AfFyXLwSi2SpxM7-uxcb90ebYEIqnMm-PQHYBB75XRVVOA&oe=680977AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=OFSpxwUBdgoQ7kNvwHXL92H&_nc_oc=AdntfhYEQsWT3Woj9wgoi1y9byofo1WfWRPc19sWU5eo0-PJtvGTmFrNQ2Cq12DIL1w7rC2MXODkcfz8OS05yWuh&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=la3FmgpW5ywBSl0xQxSOkA&oh=00_AfG0ln0_8cvH0W8GQ7yMYx5Gsz-DP-YZXowwmqWQ-VpxCw&oe=68097F96)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
